Module WitchHunt
Package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.core

Class Application

java.lang.Object
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.core.Application
public class Application extends Object

Core class in charge of initializing the application's core components.

Contains the main method. Supposed to be the Main-Class of the executable JAR's manifest.

Instantiated as a Singleton using the static method. Can be accessed globally, exposing its public and non-static members, using the same method.

When instantiated, prepares all objects that will be responsible for display and input, such as DisplayMediator the display mediator, then, instantiates the game.

Author:
FÃ©lix Houdebert, Audrey Souppaya
